desc.p: Fields DATA.STRUCT to NO.DECIMALS form a related multi value set. Standard T24 numeric field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 3 characters may be entered.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the PGM.FILE file.
Fields DATA.STRUCT to NO.DECIMALS form a related multi value set. Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 3 characters may be entered.
Used t
o define the data structure mask of the field, which is used in retrieving data through OCR.
(I.e., for alphanumeric field value like CAT123, the structure should be CAT999 and for numeric field value like 1001, the structure should be 9999).
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with maximum of 50 characters.
Mandatory field.
Fields DATA.STRUCT to NO.DECIMALS form a related multi value set. Standard T24 numeric field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 3 characters may be entered.
Fields DATA.STRUCT to NO.DECIMALS form a related multi value set.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 8 characters may be entered.
This is a multi valued field. Standard T24 numeric field.
This is a NV.NOINPUT field.
